*Drazom lays there still losing mech fluid and he rolls over to the side an=
d falls off the ledge. He misses the spiky rocks below and falls into a riv=
er. It washes him to a rock and he grabs on to it pulls himself out of the =
water* Drazom:.....sweet......Mantella......... *Drazom quietly says as he =
gets colder and colder. A tear runs out of Drazom's eye as he thinks of how=
 different this could have been...but it wasn't... Drazom just lays there w=
aiting to waste away..He see's a praying mantus walk by and he punches hiss=
elf in the face*
